>
[Antler Arrow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=706)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** arrow

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Creation of these arrows was inspired by an encounter with a [horned archon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=31) scout who sought to peacefully restrain their foes. When an activated _antler arrow_ hits a target, bone antlers extend to pin it down. The target must succeed at a DC 16 Reflex save or become stuck to the surface, taking the critical specialization effects of a [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3).

 If the hit with the _antler arrow_ is a critical hit and you have access to the bow critical specialization effect, the DC of the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check increases to 15.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
